title: User avatars are not exported in vcf
content: Hello. It seems Thunderbird does not include avatars when I export the whole contacts book as a *.vcf file. Please, be so kind as to add this feature, preferably pictures larger than 96x96 px. Or maybe I missed this magic checkbox somewhere? Thanks.
creator: Esp-nn

title: Thunderbird Accounts
content: I am using Thunderbird with both Microsoft and Gmail accounts. My question is... is Microsoft able to see that i am using a Gmail account, and/or the account name/adress, and vise versa?
creator: mcmurphy35
